name: 2021 European Conference on Communication Systems
content: PUBLICATIONï¼š As the workshop of ICCTA 2021, the accepted paper of ECCS 2021 will be included into ICCTA 2021 Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9052-1) as special chapter, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM , which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
